ComicInfo.Summary:
RICTOR HATES PARTIES.
Even the nice ones. And with Captain Britain's return to a changed world, this one is looking to be not so nice. Excalibur's Earth-shattering HELLFIRE GALA issue will change Krakoan diplomacy forever.

Asrar & Matthew Wilson | 1 | | Var | Character Design Variant Cover (Jubilee, Gambit, Gloriana, Rictor & Monarch) | Marcus To | 2 | | Var | Connecting Variant Cover (Betsy Braddock) | Russell Dauterman & Matthew Wilson | 3-4 | | Var | Design Variant Cover (Rogue) | Russell Dauterman | 5 |
